column5: Keep an eye skyward east of Barrie area and southwards,Â  just had a roaring torrential downpour with strong winds.Â  Of course the EC radar didn't show it until it was passed.

Continuous thunder here a 2 good down pours .. Amazing how many people are outside watching the sky. Fear of mother nature has set in. Parents had that huge cell go over them this afternoon. Pop said it was really wild. nickle size hail in some areas .
K-town weather watch says hail the size of FREAKIN GOLF BALLS!!!!Â  ðŸ˜²  And the wife is out for a camping trip with her sister and a bunch of friends.............ðŸ˜‰
Well if your wife is like mine they told you camping but are currently at a spa sipping sangrias...they are fine
Ummm, nope.Â  She's a hard-ass and thinks it's fun to sleep on a thin foam pad on the ground in a freakin' pup tent.Â  I got over that about thirty years ago....
ya me too. Sounds like fun for someone in their 20's

All dayÂ there have been storm watches. They marched down from northern Ontario. Every satelliteÂ image had it. I went fishing this morning and got back in time for brunch and watched the storm danceÂ across the lake. Pumped the boat out this afternoon and went back out.
